**IMPORTANT**

The CSU General Education Breadth (CSU GE-Breadth) is a series of courses that California community college (CCC) students may complete to satisfy the lower-division breadth/general education requirements before transferring to the California State University. The CSU GE-Breadth pattern is certified by the CCC and accepted by all CSU campuses.Â 

The following community college courses will satisfy CSU GE-Breadth requirement areas as indicated.
